items.name: Creme Brulee Mt
items.description: Our made-from-scratch brown sugar caramel, mixed with whole milk. This drink is highly recommended with our honey boba! Warning: highly seductive!

items.name: Sweet Hut MT
items.description: Our famous, classic black milk tea is created from an electric mix of Assam and Earl Grey. Lightly sweetened and mixed with boba.

items.name: Thai Iced MT
items.description: A strongly brewed fermented black tea topped with half-and-half.

items.name: Taro MT
items.description: Our go-to non-caffeinated drink, taro is a lightly sweet and creamy drink, tinged naturally purple!

items.name: Strawberry MT
items.description: Strawberry milk tea captures the eye with its bright pink color, and is a kid favorite for just that reason. Plus, no caffeine!

items.name: Honey Jas MT
items.description: A slightly sweeter version of our Jasmine milk tea, Honey Jasmine is a creamy version of our green tea that's been mixed with honey.

items.name: Jas Green MT
items.description: Green tea scented with jasmine blossoms is made creamy, with its sweetness scaled back a touch to let the fragrance peek through.

items.name: Oolong MT
items.description: Oolong tea's partially fermenting process gives this drink a unique earthy-tone to this wonderful drink!

items.name: Caramel MT
items.description: Our caramel milk tea is a mixture of black milk tea with Caramel flavor.

items.name: Hazelnut MT
items.description: A blend of black milk tea and hazelnut syrup, our hazelnut version offers a mildly nutty flavor.

items.name: Royal Milk Tea
items.description: One part Sweet Hut Milk Tea and one part Jasmine Green Milk Tea gives an enhanced flavor to this specialty drink!

items.name: Coffee MT
items.description: Coffee Milk Tea is a customer's favorite, a mixture of our House blended coffee and classic Sweet Hut milk tea.

items.name: Chocolate MT
items.description: Sweet Hut rich chocolate drink, lightly sweetened with condensed milk!

items.name: HK MT
items.description: A cousin of Sweet Hut milk tea, Hong Kong black milk tea is less sweet and lends a stronger tea taste than its relative, and is made with brewed Ceylon, evaporated milk, and condensed milk.

items.name: Peppermint MT
items.description: With a slight flavor kick, this peppermint milk tea has a refreshing taste compared to the traditional milk tea.

items.name: Assam Black
items.description: Assam tea is a black tea made from the leaves of the Camellia sinensis plant. Black teas are more heavily oxidized, oxidation is a chemical process that creates darker leaves and a more intense flavor, now topped with our signature Cheese Foam!

items.name: Mango Green CT
items.description: Along with its low caffeine levels, it contains a large quantity of strong, health-promoting antioxidants. The combination of creamy cheese foam, topped over cold mango green tea transform it into a delicious, healthy and guilt-free beverage!

items.name: Honey Green CT
items.description: With honey, a classic blending of complementary flavors, green tea can be a soothing hot beverage or an energizing iced refreshment. Perfect combination with silky cream cheese foam atop fresh!

items.name: Lychee Black CT
items.description: Drinking black tea is an excellent option if you are looking for an alternative of coffee or energy drinks. Lightly sweetened with Lychee syrup and with cream cheese foam top is the secret that makes this fruit tea velvety mouth feel and rich flavor.

items.name: Osmanthus Oolong
items.description: This is a traditional well-known Osmanthus Oolong tea features a dark notes of fruit with the hints of flowers, smooth and elegant. This tea is light and fragrant, a perfect choice for a sophisticated afternoon tea tray, topped with cream cheese foam

items.name: Mango Green Tea
items.description: Our pure green tea flavored with mango extract. A popular option, especially in the summer time! Recommended toppings: aloe vera and lychee jellies.

items.name: Mango Black Tea
items.description: Our pure black tea is flavored with mango extract! A popular option, especially in the summer time. Recommended toppings: aloe vera and lychee jellies.

items.name: Passion Fruit Green Tea
items.description: For an exotic twist on our original green tea, we've added passion fruit!

items.name: Passion Black Tea
items.description: For an exotic twist on our traditional black tea, we've added passion fruit!

items.name: Lychee GT
items.description: Our chilled green tea gets mixed with Lychee flavor; we recommend adding Lychee jellies for maximum Lychee flavor!

items.name: Lychee Black Tea
items.description: Our chilled black tea gets mixed with Lychee flavor; we recommend adding Lychee jellies for maximum Lychee flavor!

items.name: Orange Green Tea
items.description: Green tea is lightly sweetened with fresh orange squeezed in, made to order.

items.name: Orange Black Tea
items.description: Black tea is lightly sweetened with fresh orange squeezed in, made to order.

items.name: Lemon GT
items.description: Chilled green tea with freshly squeezed lemon juice!

items.name: Lemon BT
items.description: Chilled black tea with freshly squeezed lemon juice!

items.name: Peppermint Green Tea
items.description: Peppermint extract enhances Green tea for a refreshing, minty drink!

items.name: Wintermelon GT
items.description: This light and refreshing Winter melon Green tea is perfect for a hot summer day!

items.name: Wintermelon BT
items.description: Try this light and refreshing winter melon drink with black tea base, perfect for summer day!

items.name: Green Tea
items.description: Jasmine green tea is a healthy drink with great source of antioxidants and energizing caffeine!

items.name: Honey Green Tea
items.description: Green tea mixed with nothing but honey, both of which provide great health benefits! Recommended toppings: Honey Boba and Lychee Jelly

items.name: Honey BlackTea
items.description: Black tea mixed with nothing but honey, both of which provide great health benefits! Recommended toppings: Honey Boba and Lychee Jelly.

items.name: Black Tea
items.description: Assam blended black tea leaves given a full-bodied flavor profile!

items.name: Americano
items.description: Our specialty Intelligentsia espresso diluted with hot water makes this drink a unique flavor profile than the traditional black coffee!

items.name: House Coffee
items.description: Our house coffee contains Intelligentsia French Roast Blend that celebrates the savory side of coffee and pairs well with caramel and chocolate flavors. It emphasizes these flavors and creates a satisfying, smooth finish!

items.name: SH Iced Coffee
items.description: Our house blended coffee is made fresh daily with non-dairy creamer and sweetener.

items.name: Viet Coffee
items.description: Cà phê sữa đá translates literally into "ice coffee," and is highly requested by regulars. A shot of espresso mixed with sweetened condensed milk and then poured over ice, this one will give you a delightful energy boost!

items.name: Sea Salt Latte
items.description: A year-round staple, ours come in both steamed and iced, topped with unique sea salt whipped cream.

items.name: Latte
items.description: A classic latte made with espresso and steamed milk.

items.name: Cappucino
items.description: A traditional coffee drink with Intelligentsia espresso topped with steamed milk foam!

items.name: Chai Tea
items.description: With a spiced tea flavor, our Chai Tea Latte is our caffeine-free option for those who enjoy the traditional latte without the coffee.

items.name: Mocha
items.description: Mocha is a chocolate variant of the Classic Latte!

items.name: Matcha Latte
items.description: A non-conventional caffeine boost, this creamy latte is made with matcha powder, which is believed to offer more health benefits than plain green tea.

items.name: Caramel Macchiato
items.description: A shot of espresso layered with steamed milk with a caramel drizzle to top it off.

items.name: White Choc Mocha
items.description: The white chocolate added makes this mocha drink slightly sweeter than the original version, just the way we like it!

items.name: Hot Chocolate
items.description: A Sweet Hut rich chocolate drink, lightly sweetened with condensed milk!

items.name: Single Espresso
items.description: One shot of our Intelligentsia French Roast espresso!

items.name: Double Espresso
items.description: Double shots of our Intelligentsia French Roast espresso!

items.name: Milk
items.description: Milk is a favorite beverage not only among children but adults as well. It is a protein and calcium-filled drink that has a creamy and refreshing taste.

items.name: Taro Frappe
items.description: A frozen, blended version of our customer-favorite taro milk tea! You'll find the same unique purple color.

items.name: Mocha Frappe
items.description: Our classic blended beverage consists of a chocolate and espresso flavor!

items.name: Matcha Frappe
items.description: Powdered green tea is blended with milk and sugar until cold and creamy, an Asian take on the classic American frappe!

items.name: Hazelnut Frappe
items.description: A frozen take on our hazelnut milk tea that has a nutty flavor. This blended beverage contains a little bit of happiness with every sip!

items.name: White Choc Frappe
items.description: A creamy, dreamy blended drink flavored with white chocolate. Comes with the option to embellish it with a fruity flavor of your choice!

items.name: Caramel de Leche Frappe
items.description: Our Caramel de Leche frappe is a concept loosely based on caramelized sugar.

items.name: Toffee Cocoa Frappe
items.description: Extreme flavor with pieces of sweet and buttery toffee paired with a hint of chocolate and mountain grown coffee.

items.name: Coconut Frappe
items.description: A creamy coconut frappe that is our version of drinking iced coconut milk.

items.name: Mint Chip Frappe
items.description: Refreshing mint with real semi-sweet chocolate chips!

items.name: Choc Banana Frappe
items.description: The perfect banana split drink!

items.name: Mango Slush
items.description: Our most popular fruit slush, the mango slush is bright orange and frosty. This is a brain freeze experience you'll most likely enjoy with that tangy goodness!

items.name: Lychee Slush
items.description: Caffeine free. Sweet and refreshing, this lychee slush will help you stay cool and embrace summer, one sip at a time

items.name: Avocado Slush
items.description: Avocado slush is a unique twist on a typically savory fruit, blended when ripest with sweetened condensed milk, fresh milk, and ice!

items.name: Pineapple Slush
items.description: A tangy, icy treat that's equally as bright as the sun, ours is loaded with pineapple goodness.

items.name: Peach Pear
items.description: Caffeine free. This refreshing peach pear brings a cool taste of summer to any season.

items.name: Four Berries Slush
items.description: A slush blended with blackberries, blueberries, strawberries, and raspberries! Berrylicious!

items.name: Strawberry Slush
items.description: The go-to choice for kids. The strawberry slush is sweet and fruity, the simplest frosty drink.

items.name: Straw Banana Slush
items.description: Compared to the strawberry slush, our strawberry banana is made a bit creamier because of the banana that has been added!

items.name: Honey Lemon Aloe
items.description: Our Asian version of lemonade is made purely with lemon juice and honey. Ours come with aloe at the bottom, proven to be the perfect combination. Feel free to change it up!

items.name: Brwn Sugar Ginger Tea
items.description: Strong ginger syrup is flavored with brown sugar and created to not only clear your sinuses, but cleanse your palate with its spicy kick.

items.name: Brwn Sugar w Milk
items.description: Strong ginger syrup is flavored with brown sugar and milk created to not only clear your sinuses, but cleanse your palate with its spicy kick.

items.name: Pom Oolong Tea
items.description: Infused with pomegranate notes, this Pomegranate Oolong Tea is bursting with fruit flavors and bright floral notes.

items.name: Dragon Pearl Jasmine
items.description: This light tea is loaded with delicious jasmine scented pearls for a captivating and delicious taste.

items.name: Honey Ginseng Tea
items.description: We sweeten ginseng tea with a touch of honey, a miracle drink packed with health benefits! Best when served hot, this drink has a fragrance that is easily detected.

items.name: Japanese Sencha
items.description: Hand picked in the spring for a delicate and clean taste, our Japanese Sencha Tea is a nourishing green tea blend.

items.name: Decaf Ceylon
items.description: This decaffeinated Ceylon Tea is a smooth classic black tea from Ceylon.

items.name: Darjeeling
items.description: Typically “Darjeeling tea” refers to a black tea that is light to medium-bodied with fruity and floral notes, and perhaps a touch of briskness. It is often considered one of the finest teas in the world.

items.name: Earl Grey
items.description: A blend of four black teas, silvertips, and bergamot, this Earl Grey Tea is relaxing with its elegant flavors.

items.name: Kumquat Lemon Juice
items.description: An authentic sweet-n-sour drink is made from dried plums, kumquat preserves, and lemon juice.

items.name: Egg Tart
items.description: Derived from an iconic Portuguese treat, our version consists of soft, creamy custard caramelized in a crisp pastry shell.

items.name: Coco Tart
items.description: Glazed with a coat of apricot jelly and finished with a moist, rich coconut filling that is chewy yet crisp.

items.name: Caterpillar
items.description: Called the caterpillar for its long shape with soft ridges, this bun is filled with whipped cream cheese and dusted with confectioners sugar.

items.name: Vani Butter
items.description: A plump sweet bun, sliced open and filled with sweet cream, sprinkled with coconut flakes and topped with dried cranberries.

items.name: Choc Butter
items.description: A plump sweet bun, sliced open and filled with chocolate cream, sprinkled with coconut flakes and topped with charming chocolate shavings.

items.name: Straw Butter
items.description: A plump sweet bun, sliced open and filled with strawberry sweet cream, sprinkled with coconut flakes and topped with dried cranberries.

items.name: Choc Nutella
items.description: A sweet but filled with a Nutella center, topped with charming chocolate shavings.

items.name: Coco Buttrfly
items.description: Slices of almond cover this uniquely shaped bun, hiding a sweet, buttery coconut paste within.

items.name: Taro Butterfly
items.description: Slices of almond cover this uniquely shaped bun, hiding a sweet, rooty taro.

items.name: Custard
items.description: A favorite of young and old alike, this soft egg bun hides a cool, creamy custard for a smooth taste with creamy, milky undertones.

items.name: Blueberry chee
items.description: An architectural miracle. The blueberry cheese is made of purple blueberry filling protected by a crusty, chewy dome

items.name: Mexi Milk
items.description: Sweet bun baked with a milk cream filling and enveloped in a coffee flavored bun.

items.name: Mango Pud
items.description: The most adorable dessert bun you will ever find. Our mango pudding bun comes shaped like a paw print, hiding in a pocket of creamy mango filling.

items.name: HK Polo
items.description: A bun filled with salted butter, topped with a crunchy crust that resembles a pineapple.

items.name: Taiwan polo
items.description: A bun with a balanced texture, the Taiwanese polo features soft bread inside encased in an exterior studded with crunchy, diamond-shaped dough.

items.name: Violet
items.description: Although it looks like a muffin, this treat is scented with the mild taste of taro. Hidden inside is a hollow interior with taro-flavored mochi, a soft, gooey rice paste.

items.name: Matcha Bun
items.description: This Japanese inspired matcha green tea bun is filled with creamy matcha custard and it's simply beyond adorable!

items.name: Red Bean
items.description: A traditional favorite, featuring a center filling of sweet red bean paste.

items.name: R/BeanMochi
items.description: A cousin to our red bean bun, this sesame-topped bun contains sweet red bean paste and glutinous mochi.

items.name: Egyptian Butter
items.description: A fluffy and warm sweet Egyptian butter bread bun with a cup of milk/tea or coffee is the perfect quick breakfast or snack to boost energy.

items.name: Cinnamon Roll
items.description: Our version of the cinnamon roll is lightly sweetened with sugar, honey and filled with cinnamon. It's simply irresistible!

items.name: Hokkaido*
items.description: This soft and pillowy Japanese cupcake is filled with a dollop of vanilla buttercream.

items.name: Plain Crois
items.description: A classic buttery & flaky croissant with a lot of puff pastry that can accompany with almost any meal.

items.name: Blk Pepper Ck Puff
items.description: This pastry features tender black pepper chicken sheathed in a light, flaky puff with a dusting of almond flakes on top.

items.name: Curry Ck Puff
items.description: Heart chicken smothered in curry sauce in a soft, flaky turnover-shaped pastry.

items.name: Curry Ck Bun
items.description: A round bun that hides chicken cooked in a spice-filled curry sauce and sprinkled with wheat germ.

items.name: BBQ Pork Bun
items.description: Pork tossed in a tangy Asian BBQ sauce folded within layers of puff pastry.

items.name: pork sung roll
items.description: Crunchy, melt-in-your-mouth dried shredded pork floss are stuffed into this roll, making for a savory experience.

items.name: Pork Sung Bun
items.description: This small, oblong bun is covered in crunchy melt-in-your-mouth dried, shredded pork floss.

items.name: Spring Onion
items.description: This vegetarian treat includes diced green onions enclosed in a soft bun for a sweet yet peppery taste.

items.name: Garlic Cheese
items.description: This garlic cheese bun is perfectly delicious with a light sprinkle of chopped parsley. It's a good savory choice for breakfast!

items.name: Sweet Corn and Ham
items.description: Sliced ham and corn seasoned with pepper, this savory treat is perfect for breakfast.

items.name: Hot Dog Cheese
items.description: Sausage rolled and baked in bread with three different cheeses.

items.name: Ham and Cheese
items.description: Sliced ham and white cheese seasoned with pepper. This savory treat is perfect for breakfast.

items.name: Spring Dog
items.description: Our homage to the All-American staple includes chunks of hot dog and diced green onions baked within a soft bun.

items.name: Mozarella
items.description: Can you imagine the the taste of the melting cheese when you bite into the bun? It's best to serve hot, reheat in the microwave, toaster oven or oven for the true melting experience!

items.name: Spinach and Cheese
items.description:
Your kids hate vegetable?
Try our first green bun, colored with fresh spinach juice, topped with fresh spinach and cheddar cheese!

items.name: Thai Chili
items.description: Try our new Thai Chili Bun, with fragrant chili sauce stir fry with belacan shrimp paste, ground chicken and egg, enveloped in our signature soft bun!

items.name: Asian Garden
items.description: Grilled chicken, spring mix, baby spinach, European cucumbers, roasted almonds, shredded carrots, and fried wontons with a Sesame ginger dressing.

items.name: Four Berries Salad
items.description: Spring mix, chopped romaine, blueberries, blackberries, strawberries, raspberries and roasted walnuts with Pineapple dressing.

items.name: Caesar
items.description: Grilled chicken, chopped romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, and garlic croutons with Caesar dressing.

items.name: Fresh Spinach
items.description: Baby spinach, roasted walnuts, mandarin oranges, fresh sliced strawberries, dried cranberries and feta cheese with a Raspberry vinaigrette dressing.

items.name: SH (Bulgogi)
items.description: Fresh Angus beef made with a Bulgogi sauce, cheddar cheese, pickled carrot, baby spinach, sliced cucumbers, our homemade slaw, and avocado topped with out organic whole wheat bun.

items.name: Bibimbap
items.description: A Bulgogi burger topped with stir-fried carrots, sesame seasoned bean sprouts and spinach, and a fried egg, drizzled with our house made sauce on our homemade whole-wheat bun.

items.name: Tofu Burger
items.description: Pan-fried tofu, portabella mushroom, baby spinach, roasted bell pepper, red onion, avocado, cumcumber, balsamic glase, and Sweet Hut sauce,

items.name: Cheese Burger
items.description: Seasoned patty on a whole wheat bun includes mayo, lettuce, tomato, red onion and pickles

items.name: Lemon Pork
items.description: Charbroiled lemon grass pork, pickled carrots, sliced jalapenos, and cilantro with a homemade sauce served on a fresh baked Hoagie.

items.name: Bulgogi Cheese
items.description: Thinly sliced sirloin steak, grilled portabella mushrooms and onions, topped with provolone cheese, drizzled with Bulgogi sauce served on a fresh baked Hoagie spread with a light layer of our homemade mayo.

items.name: Miso Sesame
items.description: Grilled chicken breast or steak topped with pepper jack cheese, green onions top a freshly baked Hoagie roll with a thinly spread layer of Miso-sesame mayo.

items.name: Chipotle Ck
items.description: Grilled chicken breast, baby spinach, roasted bell pepper, cilantro, and provolone cheese on a fresh baked Ciabatta spread with chipotle mayo.

items.name: Artichoke Tk
items.description: Sliced smoked turkey, Swiss cheese, and baby spinach accompanied by artichoke pesto on our freshly baked Ciabatta.

items.name: Spy Bulgogi Ck
items.description: Grilled marinated chicken breast with Bulgogi sauce, baby spinach, caramelized onion, roasted bell pepper, and pepper jack cheese with Sriracha mayo.

items.name: Portabella Mushroom
items.description: Portabella mushroom, baby spinach, roasted bell pepper, sliced red onion, avocado, and sliced cucumbers, top our freshly baked Ciabatta with a balsamic glaze and our homemade sauce.

items.name: Turkey Sandwich
items.description: Smoked turkey, Swiss cheese, spinach, sliced tomato, mayonnaise, and Dijon mustard on our freshly baked multi-grain bread.

items.name: Turkey Bacon
items.description: Smoked turkey, bacon, Swiss cheese, spinach, sliced tomato, mayonnaise, and Dijon mustard on our freshly baked multi-grain bread.

items.name: Chicken Salad
items.description: Chicken salad made with grilled chicken breast, red grapes, celery, dried cranberries, and roasted almonds, sit on top of spinach, and sliced tomatoes in between slices of fresh baked multi-grain bread or a croissant.

items.name: Avocado BLT
items.description: All-time favorite; avocado, bacon, lettuce and sliced tomatoes between our multi-grain bread.

items.name: Avocado Toast
items.description: Avocado, sliced tomatoes and lettuce between our multi-grain bread.

items.name: BLT + egg
items.description: All-time favorite; avocado, egg, bacon, lettuce and sliced tomatoes between our multi-grain bread.

items.name: Bao Tofu
items.description: Unique miniature crispy bao, crispy on the outside and fluffy on the inside, A perfect combination with our soft tofu, pickled carrot, avocado, green leaf

items.name: Bao Unagi
items.description: Unique miniature crispy bao, crispy on the outside and fluffy on the inside, A perfect combination with unagi, cucumber, avocado and green leaf.

items.name: Bao Lemon Pork
items.description: Unique miniature crispy bao, crispy on the outside and fluffy on the inside, A perfect combination with our lemongrass pork, pickled carrot, cilantro, green leaf

items.name: Salt Pepper Nuggets
items.description: A Taiwanese favorite, our tender chicken nuggets are lightly buttered and seasoned with salt and black pepper served on a bed of basil leaves for a savory treat. Choose from non-spicy, mild, medium or spicy!

items.name: Firecracker Shrimp
items.description: These rolls of succulent shrimp meat are intricately wrapped in crispy tofu skin, popping in your mouth once bitten into for an addictive eating experience.

items.name: Crispy Tofu
items.description: A vegetarian favorite, paired with mango sauce. Beneath its firm, crispy shell lays soft, silky tofu. You may never eat tofu prepared another way again!

items.name: Fish Cake
items.description: Chewy fish tofu covered with cumin powder.

items.name: Samosa
items.description: Ubiquitous throughout India, our version of the popular vegetarian staple features mashed check peas, spiced potatoes, onions, and lentils wrapped and fried in a crunchy shell served with a tangy curry sauce on the side.

items.name: Spring Roll
items.description: Crispy vegetarian rolls served with homemade sweet and sour sauce.

items.name: Fries (Plain)
items.description: A classic favorite: crispy julienne cut potato fries dusted with fry seasoning.

items.name: Sweet Potato Fries
items.description: A variation of ordinary fries and favorite of sweet potato fans, copious amounts of cut sweet potato are fried until crispy and seasoned sparingly with salt and pepper.

items.name: Bacon Cheese Fries
items.description: Classic julienne cut fries smothered in generous heaps of melted cheese, bacon, and spring onions. The ultimate pick-me-up for any occasion.

items.name: Waffle Bacon Cheese
items.description: Classic potatoes cut in a waffle pattern smothered in generous heaps of melted cheese, bacon, and spring onions. The ultimate pick-me-up for any occasion.

items.name: waffle Fries
items.description: Crispy waffle fries ~ potatoes cut in a waffle pattern make the perfect base for a plethora of toppings and sauces. These fries are crunchy, delicious and the perfect side on any plate.

items.name: MacaronsGift
items.description: These small, dainty cookies have big flavors. This light and airy cookie is filled with flavored butter creams. Flavors include; mocha, salted caramel, mango, strawberry, blueberry, and chocolate ganache.

items.name: Macarons - 2
items.description: These small, dainty, cookies have big flavors. This light and airy cookie is filled with flavored butter creams. Flavors include; mocha, salted caramel, mango, strawberry, blueberry and chocolate ganache.

items.name: Mini Fruit Tart
items.description: Dessert for one, our mini fruit tart is a medley of strawberries, blueberries,and kiwis atop a rich cream in a baked pastry shell.

items.name: Bluebry tart
items.description: Blueberry purée swirled with a cheesecake filled tart shell for a cute bite-sized treat!

items.name: ChocoGanach
items.description: A rich chocolate ganache layered above a classic cheesecake, with a crushed Oreo cookie crust.

items.name: Strwbry Chee
items.description: A combination of cheesecake and strawberries creates an impeccable harmony, and is drizzled with a light strawberry sauce.

items.name: Midnight Lady
items.description: Chocolate chiffon cake filled with walnuts layered with chocolate buttercream, chocolate ganache and covered in a chocolate glaze. Warning: Highly Seductive!

items.name: Red Velvet Cake
items.description: A traditional matching of luscious cream cheese filling and a vibrant red chocolate cake.

items.name: Caramel Brulee
items.description: This creme brulee cake takes all the elements of a traditional creme brulee and turns them into a delicious layer cake, tops with caramelized glaze.

items.name: Blck Forest
items.description: Chocolate chiffon cake layered with whipped cream and dark cherries soaked in brandy.

items.name: StrwbrryYogurtS
items.description: Vanilla chiffon cake with a layer of creamy yogurt-based strawberry mousse. Strawberry jam paired with fresh strawberries lay atop the cake for a delicate sweetness.

items.name: Mango Mousse S
items.description: This cake highlights a mango mousse layered between vanilla chiffon cake and topped with fresh mango.

items.name: Oreo Mousse
items.description: Crushed Oreos folded into a sweet mousse, topped with an Oreo.

items.name: Tiramisu Cup
items.description: This classic Italian dessert contains cocoa and espresso that is blanketed in mascarpone and dusted lightly with cocoa powder.

items.name: Hazelnut Mousse
items.description: This hazelnut mousse rests on top of a bed of silky smooth chiffon cake.

items.name: Chocolate Mousse
items.description: This delectable milk chocolate mousse rests on top of a bed of silky smooth chiffon cake.

items.name: Straw Pudding
items.description: A light custard pudding on top of a light strawberry purée.

items.name: Caramel Pudding
items.description: Creamy egg custard on top of a light caramel sauce. When stirred together, this dessert is the perfect treat!

items.name: Creme Brulee
items.description: A rich custard based finished with a torched caramelized sugar top.

items.name: Cream Puff
items.description: Our large puff is filled with sweet cream and stuffed with strawberries!

items.name: Jap Cake Mini
items.description: This light and fluffy mini Japanese Cheesecake is a perfect dessert for a real cheesecake lover. It's a melt-in-your-mouth combination of creamy cheesecake and airy soufflé.

items.name: Japanese Cheese
items.description: This light and fluffy Japanese Cheesecake is a perfect dessert for sharing. It's a melt-in-your-mouth combination of creamy cheesecake and airy soufflé.

items.name: Fruit Ck
items.description: Vanilla cake, sweet cream, and fruit filling. Perfect for all occasions.

items.name: Tiramisu 6"
items.description: (6" serve 8 people) This classic Italian dessert is made for coffee and cocoa lovers! We start off by soaking sponge cake in mixture of rich nutty espresso, then layered with lightly sweetened marscapone cheese and finally dusted with cocoa powder.

items.name: Taro 6"
items.description: (6" serve 8 people) In this cake, we fold taro root together with sweet cream to give it a smooth texture. We then layer it on top of taro scented cake so there is a bit of fresh taro in every bite.

items.name: Fruit Cake 6''
items.description: (6" serve 8 people) This cake highlights the natural sweetness of fruit as we layer together pillowy vanilla sponge cake, fresh cream that has been whipped into soft peaks and topped with assorted fresh fruits.

items.name: Matcha 6"
items.description: (6" serve 8 people) Our fragrant matcha cake is created by baking matcha powder into our cake base. We then offset the slight bitterness of the matcha green tea by adding a layer of sweet cream. Green Tea Lovers are going to be obsessed with it!

items.name: Mango Mousse 6"
items.description: (6" serve 8 people) It's all about mango! This cake highlights a mango-flavored chiffon cake layered between sweet light cream, finished with a rim of mango lace and topped with freshly cut diced mango. A cake that is sure to impress!

items.name: Red Velvet 6"
items.description: (6" serve 8 people) A traditional Southern staple known for its vibrant red color cocoa based cake. It is reinvented as we emphasize the importance of cream cheese in every bite with thinner layers of cake and more layers of cream cheese filling.

items.name: Blackforest 6"
items.description: (6" serve 8 people) With this cake, you no longer have to choose between chocolate and fruit. We start by soaking sweet black cherries in brandy and then fold into sweet cream.This mix becomes the filling between layers of chocolate cake.

items.name: Chocolate Mousse 6"
items.description: (6" serve 8 people) We start with a base of lightly sweetened chocolate sponge cake layered with fluffy creamy chocolate mousse. We then topped with layer of decadent Chocolate Ganache and finished with a rim of chocolate lace for an elegant design!

items.name: Mocha Walnut 6"
items.description: (6" serve 8 people) We create the mocha favor by baking espresso and cocoa into our sponge cake. We then infuse sweet cream with espresso and sweet Khalua which is finished with roasted walnuts that adds a nice nutty layer to our mocha cake.

items.name: Midnight Lady 6"
items.description: (6" serve 8 people) Light and fluffy sponge cake partnered with crunchy roasted walnuts that we fold into a sweet chocolate buttercream, is dressed in a layer of chocolate ganache that is sure to seduce cake lovers everywhere as its name suggests.

items.name: Strawberry Yogurt 6"
items.description: (6" serve 8 people) In this cake, we partnered strawberry puree and tart yogurt to create a smooth and creamy mousse. We then layer it on our soft vanilla sponge cake and top off with peaks of sweet strawberry cream and a bit of strawberry puree.

items.name: Strawberry Cheese 6"
items.description: (6" serve 8 people) Hidden inside this cheesecake is a sweet strawberry swirl that is baked into the cheesecake giving you a taste of strawberry in every bite. Topped with fresh strawberries, this cheesecake is perfect for any party at any age.

items.name: Chocolate Ganache 6"
items.description: (6" serve 8 people) Rich dark chocolate and cheesecake come together to form this doubly decadent combination. In this cake you will find both a layer of dark chocolate cheesecake and a layer of traditional cheesecake partnered with Oreo crust!

items.name: Strawberry Cake 6"
items.description: Strawberry Cake

items.name: Slice SR (Taro)
items.description: In this cake, we fold taro root together with sweet cream to give it a smooth texture. We then layer it on top of taro scented cake roll so there is a bit of taro in every bite.

items.name: Slice SR (Mocha)
items.description: We create the mocha favor by baking espresso and cocoa into our sponge cake. We then infuse sweet cream with espresso that adds a hint of coffee to our mocha swiss roll.

items.name: Slice SR (Matcha)
items.description: Our fragrant matcha cake roll is created by baking matcha powder into our cake base. We then offset the slight bitterness of the matcha green tea by adding a layer of adzudki red bean sweet cream.

items.name: Slice SR (black Forest)
items.description: With this cake, you no longer have to choose between chocolate and fruit. We start by soaking sweet black cherries and then fold into sweet cream. This cherry and sweet cream mix becomes the filling between chocolate sponge cake roll.

items.name: Slice SR (Strawberry)
items.description: This is a delicate refreshing Swiss roll perfect for warm days of spring and summer. A soft vanilla sponge cake filled with strawberry puree, a perfect dessert that is loved by all!

items.name: Mocha Swiss Roll
items.description: Mocha chiffon cake rolled together with sweet mocha whipped cream, a coffee lovers dream.

items.name: Matcha Swiss Roll
items.description: Matcha green tea chiffon cake rolled with an Azuki red bean filling.

items.name: Taro Swiss Roll
items.description: In this cake, we fold taro root together with sweet cream to give it a smooth texture. We then layer it on top of taro scented cake roll so there is a bit of taro in every bite.
